content: everyday bucket hat introduction i design this hat with a shorter and narrower brim it s more elegant than a usual bucket hat i crochet this hat from magic_ring and work in spiral it means that you won t see the join line when you finish the hat you can fold the hat put it in your bag and wear it everyday material 1 yarn 1 skein knitpicks dishie worsted weight 100% cotton 100 g/3 5 oz each 2 hook us size g-6 4mm crochet hook 3 tools 1 stitch marker for marking the end of a round 1 tapestry needle for weaving in ends gauge 16 sts and 20 row in single_crochet = 4 skills -
